short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ITZA's Chrome extension lets you earn Yakka by watching Youtube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ITZA's Yakka Chrome Extension designed for avid YouTube watchers seeking rewards for their viewing time!

Earn Yakka effortlessly while enjoying your favourite videos, unlocking a unique currency to redeem exciting rewards, discounts, and exclusive offers. 

Transform every video from which you learn something into a rewarding adventure, making every YouTube moment count. Geek out like never before, and let your Yakka accumulate for delightful surprises!
